I wanted to say this, I'm Chinese, This epilogue was on another level of NTR, The original series was like a fantastic cake and this epilogue was a sweet topping to it. This epilogue is by far the HEAVIEST of all I read. I, not a fan of NTR nor vanilla, I fairly enjoy them from time to time. But this..... this is not for the weak-hearted, Those who trained to endure the NTR, not for you. Stay out. Even just for those ordinary, stay away. For those hardcore, this is a gem in our collection. To read this type, you cannot look at the perspective of the protagonist. That's all I'm going to say. Damn, This shit is hardcore. Always a fan since her first debut. Wish she would draw this similar style on a different plot. Vanilla, casual NTR for the ordinary reader. BUT once in a while, drop a bomb to spice thing up. Overall I love it but won't read it again.
